relationships.notes: Respond to the woman’s report about Jesus, going out to see him because of what she said.
Urge Jesus to stay, hear his teaching over two days, and confess him as the Savior of the world based on their own experience.

traits.initial_response: Leave the town to meet Jesus after hearing the woman’s testimony about a man who told her everything she ever did.
traits.growing_faith: Move from belief because of her words to belief grounded in personal encounter, confessing Jesus as Savior of the world.
traits.hospitality: Invite Jesus to remain with them, resulting in a two-day stay that extends his ministry beyond Judea and Galilee.
